name: Dance Party with Jagriti
description:
Looking to enjoy your Sunday while still getting a great workout in? Join us at this 1 hour Dance Party with Jagriti vibing to all the HITS in our cutest fits! 
Date: 23rd Feb 2025, Sunday 
Time: 9-10 am (Please arrive at the studio by 8.45 am) 
Venue: Dhurii Academy of Arts, Domlur 
*Be sure to bring a water bottle to stay hydrated!

name: Pickleballin' Queens Cup - Singles | Intermediate to Advance
url: https://sistersinsweat.in/session_details/pickleball/Pickleballin' Queens Cup - Singles | Intermediate to Advance
description:
Women-Only Pickleball Tournament 
ARRIVAL TIME: 9:15AM 
📅 Date: Sunday, February 23 
⏰ Time: 10:00 AM 
📍 Venue: GoRally, Indiranagar 
Tournament Category: Singles, Intermediate to Advance 
Tournament Format 
1.⁠ ⁠Round Robin Stage: 
•⁠  ⁠3-4 teams per group 
•⁠  ⁠Each team plays against every other team in their group 
2.⁠ ⁠Knockout Stage: 
•⁠  ⁠The top 2 teams from each group advance to the Quarterfinals 
•⁠  ⁠Winners move on to the Semifinals 
•⁠  ⁠Finalists compete for the championship 
Match Format: 
•⁠  ⁠One set played to 11 service points 
•⁠  ⁠If the score reaches 10-10, a golden point decides the winner 
Facilities & Refreshments 
🏃‍♀️ Stay energized at the Kenko Health Café & Coffee Bar at the venue 
🚿 Amenities available: Loos, showers, and changing rooms 
🚗 Parking: Ample space available

location.name: GoRally
location.address: Indiranagar, Exit Road,  No 52 MSIL Building,  Old Airport Rd,  near Blue Dart,  Bengaluru,  Karnataka 560017

name: Footy Game-Night Sisters and Misters
description:
Hey Ladies! 
We are introducing football game-nights to our session offerings. These game-nights are 90mins of complete game time. It will be an 8v8 game with substitutes and a mixed-format game, which means there will be men joining in for these as well. The reason we are doing this is to give you amazing women more match based experience in football and to have high intensity games, definitely improves that! 
Please note that it is necessary for you to have prior experience with the basics of football. These game-nights are not for beginners. 
Please note that this is only for women to book, the men's bookings will be taken through a closed whatsapp group. 
Join us ladies! It's going to be a blast! 
 
Contact: Vaibhavi - 9886520914

name: B'ball game night with the Sisters and Misters
url: https://sistersinsweat.in/session_details/basketball/B'ball game night with the Sisters and Misters
description:
BBALL WITH THE SISTERS and MISTERS   
Hey Ladies! 
We are introducing Basketball game nights to our session offerings. These game nights are of complete game time with 4 Quarters. It will be a 5v5 full Court game with substitutes and a mixed-format game, which means there will be men joining in for these as well. The reason we are doing this is to give you amazing women more match-based experience in basketball and to have high-intensity games, definitely improves that! 
Please note that you must have prior experience with the basics of Basketball. These game nights are not for beginners. 
Please note that this is only for women to book, the men's bookings will be taken through a closed WhatsApp group. 
Join us, ladies! It's going to be a blast! 
Contact: Vaibhavi-9886520914

name: B'ball With The Sisters - Beginners & Intermediate
description:
Hey ladies, get ready to play some Bball with us! 
These sessions are open to all women at rhe beginners level of the sport. The basketball drills we be designed to both push you and at the same time, build on your basics! Each session is 90mins long, and will consist of a warm up, basketball drills which are fun and athletic, a small game and cool down at the end. It is a super fun activity to add to your day and apart from that, even helps you get inyour cardio for the day! 
For any further queries contact: Vaibhavi - 9886520914

name: Pickleball with the Sisters (GoRally x SIS) Coached Session
description:
LADIES! 
We have something new planned for you! 
Come try a new and easy to learn sport with us! 
Pickleball is one of the fastest growing sports in the world and we are here to help you learn! 
 
These sessions will be a mix of Coached + Play Only sessions. Pickleball is a very easy sport to pick-up and play, but we are providing an opportunity to be coached. this will also help you prep for our upcoming tournament.  
 
These sessions are 1.5 hour long, so we recommend arriving 15minutes early to finish up your warm-up and to maximise your time on the court. 
 
Some points to note: 
* Paddle & ball (equipment) will be available at the venue and is included in the cost of the workshop and sessions 
* Wear training/sports shoes, not running shoes. Running shoes have a taller sole profile, built for uni-directional movement only, while the sole profile of training/sports shoes are closer to the ground and are built for multi-directional movement 
* The venue has a cute F&B counter, in case you'd like some refreshments 
* ⁠The venue has clean washrooms for women, equipped with a shower, hair dryer etc 
* ⁠Parking is available at the venue 
 
Enjoy this new sport Sister! 
 
Any issues, please contact:  
Vaibhavi: 9886520914

name: Footy With Sisters & Misters - Game-Day, SUFC Ulsoor
url: https://sistersinsweat.in/session_details/football/Footy With The Sisters - Game-Day, SUFC Ulsoor
description:
FOOTY GAME DAY! 
Get ready for an exciting, high-energy football experience where fun meets competition! Our mixed-gender game day is designed to elevate the excitement, build team spirit, and create a dynamic playing environment for everyone on the field. Intermediate level, 90mins of pur game-time. 
What to wear? comfortable workout clothes, incase you do't have access to football studs/turf shoes, training shoes would be sufficient. 
What to bring? A bottle of water, a towel to wipe off sweat (if required) and loads of enthusiasm to play :)  
See you on the field sisters! 
For any further further queries contact 
Vaibhavi - 9886520914

name: B'ball With Sisters - Intermediate
description:
BBALL WITH THE SISTERS - FRIDAY - INTERMEDIATE SESSIONS 
Bring out those kicks and get your bounce on, we're getting out on the court to play some BALL! 
These sessions are open to all women at the intermediate level! The basketball drills will be desgned to both push you and at the same time, build on your existing basics! A bit of prior playing experience is required, not recommended for beginners. Each session is 90mins long, and will consist of a warm up, basketball drills which are fun & athletic, a small game and a cool down at the end, It is a super fun start to your day and apart from that, even helps you get in your cardio for the day! 
What to wear? comfortable workout clothes, incase you don't have access to basketball shoes, training shoes would be sufficient. 
What to bring? A bottle of water, a towel to wipe off sweat (if required) and loads of entusiasm to play :) See you on the court sisters! 
For any further queries contact 
Vaibhavi - 9886520914

Hey Ladies! 🎉 
Exciting news! We’re introducing Baddy Gameday to our sessions—a 120-minute adrenaline-packed game time! 💥 
This mixed-format session means men will join in too, giving you an opportunity to sharpen your skills with high-intensity match experience. 🏸💪

 Bookings are exclusively for women (men will register through a closed WhatsApp group). 
 
Don’t miss out, ladies—let’s make it a smashing good time!

Vaibhavi - 9886520914

name: Run With The Sisters
description:
Bangalore Sisters! 
 
There's nothing quite like starting your Sunday by running in Cubbon Park - the lungs of the city - with a group of amazing women! 
 
The Run session is led by an instructor and includes warm up, a 3K/5K run in the park (based on your comfort) and cool down.  
 
Meeting Time: 6:50am 
Meeting Point: In front of Coffee Day Square, across Cubbon Park 
 
After everyone has collected at the meeting point, we walk across to Cubbon Park by around 7am, where the instructor will begin the Warm Up. 
 
Level: This session is open to runners of all Levels, from absolute beginners to regular runners. 
 
What you should carry: 
• Bottle of water 
• Running shoes preferable 
 
In case of any queries, feel free to contact: 
Adit: +91 89514 18918 
Vaibhavi: 9886520914

name: Yoga with The Sisters
description:
Yoga With The Sisters 
Progressive Vinyasa classes with Chanchal are a blend of breath work, strong but approachable flow, mindful postural focus, and deep soothing support. 
Classes cultivate balance, stability, flexibility, mobility and vigor as the asana ebbs and flows between effort and ease. 
Students can expect a mix of both traditional lineage based practices & progressive movement intended for modern bodies and demands. 
Yoga Instructor: Chanchal 
Meeting time: 8:15  
Meeting Point: CCD Square 
For any further queries conact 
Vaibhavi - 9886520914

name: Baddy With Sisters, Beginner + Intermediate Play Zone
url: https://sistersinsweat.in/session_details/badminton/Baddy With Sisters, Beginner + Intermediate Play Zone
description:
Badminton for Beginners & Intermediate! 
Whether you’re picking up a racket for the first time or looking to improve your game, our Beginner & Intermediate Badminton sessions are designed to help you build confidence, refine your technique, and have a great time on the court. You’ll get the chance to learn through drills, practice sessions, and friendly matches, making every game both a learning experience and a whole lot of fun. sessions are 120mins long. 
What to wear? comfortable workout clothes and non-marking shoes 
What to bring? A bottle of water, a towel to wipe off sweat (if required) and loads of entusiasm to play :) See you on the court sisters! 
For any further queries contact 
Vaibhavi - 9886520914
